title: Frost Core
summaries: The Frost Core is a Hardmode crafting material which is dropped by Ice Golems. Its sole purpose is to craft the Frost armor set and the Cool Whip. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile versions it can be used to craft the Blizzard in a Bottle as well.
